0.text: Bug 22274  [DND] Navigator should not sync selection with editor on drag.

1.text: If I have two resources A and B open in their editors, and I try to drag A into  B from the navigator view, I cannot.

2.text: The navigator will flip the active active  editor to A, making it impossible to drop on B.

3.text: It is possible to avoid this by checking the dragsourceevent.doit value during  the dragStart callback, and storing this value until the drag finished callback  has occurred.

4.text: If it is true, then a native drag is about to start.

5.text: The  mousedown or selection event should come after the dragStart event, and "Link  navigator selection to active Editor" can be suppressed.
